hero.title: About VisaFly
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner for dummy tickets and visa documentation since 1990

whatAreDummyTickets.title: What Are Dummy Tickets?
whatAreDummyTickets.subtitle: Understanding flight reservations for visa applications
whatAreDummyTickets.description: A dummy ticket is a verifiable flight reservation that looks exactly like a regular airline ticket with a valid PNR (Passenger Name Record) or booking reference number. These are commonly used for visa applications where proof of travel plans is required.

features.title: Professional Format
features.description: Looks exactly like a real airline ticket

features.title: Accepted Worldwide
features.description: Recognized by embassies and immigration authorities

ourCommitment.title: Our Commitment
ourCommitment.subtitle: Dedicated to making your visa application process smooth and successful
ourCommitment.mission: Our mission is to simplify the visa application process by providing authentic, verifiable flight reservations that are accepted by embassies worldwide. We understand the importance of proper documentation in your visa journey and strive to make it as seamless as possible.
